name: MuteGithubThreadNotifications
description:
Mute all future notifications for a GitHub thread.

Use this tool to mute notifications for a specific GitHub conversation thread. Notifications will be silenced until you comment on the thread or receive an @mention. This tool is helpful if you want to focus on relevant updates without distractions.

parameters.name: notification_thread_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the specific GitHub notification thread to mute. Obtain from the `id` field of fetched notifications.

value_schema.description: The unique identifier of the notification thread. This corresponds to the value returned in the `id` field when you retrieve notifications (for example with the [`GET /notifications` operation](https://docs.github.com/enterprise-server@3.8/rest/reference/activity#list-notifications-for-the-authenticated-user)).
